title: Schema for an executor which delegates a build.
description: Options for delegating a build to a different target.

buildTarget.description: Build target used for building the application after its dependencies have been built.

outputPath.description: The full path for the output directory, relative to the workspace root.

tsConfig.description: The full path for the TypeScript configuration file, relative to the workspace root.

watch.description: Whether to run a build when any file changes.
